abstract: “NBC will keep Jay Leno five nights a week, but in prime time, competing not with David Letterman, but with shows like ‘CSI: Miami.'”
snippet: “NBC will keep Jay Leno five nights a week, but in prime time, competing not with David Letterman, but with shows like ‘CSI: Miami.'”
lead_paragraph: “NBC will keep Jay Leno five nights a week, but in prime time, competing not with David Letterman, but with shows like ‘CSI: Miami,'” Bill Carter reports.

headline.main: Leno to Host 10 p.m. Hour on NBC
